'''''"Atlatl's Blessing"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Duelist: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Rock-Cavernous Wayob Manifestation|text="Atlatl's Blessing" &mdash; Will of Plumes Swift}} while parrying and successfully landing a counterattack every time it uses a power attack.

==Gameplay Notes==
* "Power attack" refers to '''Rotor Spin''' and '''Shattering Box'''. A blue flash will occur to indicate when the player should press the Parry button.<!--
-->{{Preview
|file1    = Rock-Cavernous Wayob Manifestation Rotor Spin 2
|caption1 = Rotor Spin

|file2    = Rock-Cavernous Wayob Manifestation Shattering Box 2
|caption2 = Shattering Box
}}
* It is possible for the counterattack to miss if the player stands too far. If a counterattack misses, the achievement will fail for the current run.
